reviewText: The DVD was not only severely scratched, it was also dirty. I didn't buy an item that said used. I also think it's a copy of the original that was just repackaged because I can't play it everywhere. This item deserves 0 stars. Awful awful awful! The only good thing about this purchase is that it was fulfilled by Amazon. I had to add a video because it was impossible to take a picture with the accurate state of the DVD because of the glare.

La pelcula es buena pero el disco est mal hecho ya que la pelcula no se puede adelantar, rebobinar, nada. Una vez uno pone la pelcula, no se puede hacer nada ms, aparte de pausarla. No se puede saltar directamente a una escena y si, por desgracia, se te ocurre apretar el boton forward, la pelcula vuelve a empezar. Primera vez que veo algo as en una pelcula original.
this is a documentary that touch your feelings deeply. a true history that you never forget, the system in united states is broken
